backend/core/auth/dependencies.py.description: Auth dependencies use HTTPBearer security scheme to extract tokens from Authorization header. get_current_user() validates JWT and checks Redis blacklist. get_optional_user_object() returns None for unauthenticated requests.

backend/features/auth/service.py.description: AuthService handles login/register/refresh/logout with Redis-based token whitelist (refresh tokens) and blacklist (invalidated tokens). Implements RTR (Refresh Token Rotation) on token refresh.

frontend/src/api/client.ts.description: Axios client with request interceptor adding Authorization header from localStorage, and response interceptor handling 401 with automatic token refresh. Uses refresh token queue to prevent concurrent refresh calls.

frontend/src/components/AuthProvider.tsx.description: React AuthProvider storing tokens in localStorage (access_token, refresh_token, user). Provides login/register/googleLogin/logout functions. Checks localStorage on mount for existing session.
